criteria.name: Insightfulness
criteria.description: The analysis demonstrates deep insights into the funder's implicit needs beyond what's explicitly stated.

criteria.name: Evidence-Based Interpretation
criteria.description: The analysis is well-supported by specific evidence from the RFP document.

criteria.name: Comprehensiveness
criteria.description: The analysis covers all significant aspects of what the funder is seeking without major omissions.

criteria.name: Prioritization
criteria.description: The analysis effectively prioritizes the funder's requirements by importance.

criteria.name: Funding Context Awareness
criteria.description: The analysis demonstrates understanding of the broader context, goals, and constraints of the funding entity.

criteria.name: Unstated Needs Identification
criteria.description: The analysis identifies important unstated needs or assumptions that will influence proposal success.

criteria.name: Clarity
criteria.description: The analysis clearly articulates the funder's sought solution without ambiguity.

criteria.name: Objectivity
criteria.description: The analysis maintains objectivity without projecting assumptions or biases.

criteria.name: Strategic Alignment
criteria.description: The analysis identifies alignment opportunities between the funder's goals and the proposal's direction.

criteria.name: Competition Awareness
criteria.description: The analysis demonstrates awareness of what might differentiate a successful proposal from others.

evaluationInstructions: Evaluate the solution_sought analysis against each criterion. For each criterion, provide a score between 0.0 and 1.0, where 0.0 is completely failing to meet the criterion and 1.0 is perfectly meeting it. Provide specific feedback for scores below the pass threshold.
